answers.answer: Following! I'm in the same boat due to no fetal movement.

I was induced because I was overdue. I also had not dilated at all. Just prepare yourself that it will be a long labor. Everything just kinda moves slow. Pain wise it wasn't as bad as I thought it would be. I had meds towards the end. My total labor was 18hrs. It's always worse in your head than it turns out to be! You'll do fine!
Thank you !! I feel a little better. I just hope if i do get induced it doesn't end up in a c section later on.
37weeks is considered full term. Baby will be ok :) don't stress it. You'll do great.

I was induced with my first, I was two weeks past my due date and hadn't dilated at all.. It wasn't bad, just slow. I was induced on Thursday and she was born early Saturday morning. I had drugs so it wasn't very painful at all. It's a scary thought but not bad at all.. You will be fine. Good luck. :)
Thank you :) I'll find out tomorrow morning if he'll induce me or wait for him to come on his own.  Lol it all depends on how my blood pressure is
You got this!! 37 weeks is considered safe! Hope your bp. Is lower for your safety and the babies dear! But if not you will be having your little love early! Yay!!

I was induced at 39+1 due to gestational diabetes. Went in on a Monday they gave me cervidil (gel inserted to help thin and dilate ) for 12 hours. It did nothing so they tried pitocin and that gave me some contractions but No progression. So they tried the cervidil again for 12 hours and it dilated me a fingertip so they started potion again and that did nothing. Got sent home for a day came back on Friday started potion again gave me small contractions and I was only dilated to a 1 so at 440 they prepped me and I got a c section. To be honest c sections aren't as scary as you think they'll be. The before you go in part is but the actual procedure No. Not trying to scare you just informing you of possibilities

My induction was horrible. I got induced becuase I was border line preeclampsia.  I was 39 weeks. Anyways I got to the hospital at 7 am on March 14 they started me on cervidal for 12 hours, checked me at 7 pm, then put another one in cuz i was only dilated 1 cm. So after another 12 hours they tried to put this balloon thingy in between my cervix and my sons head to help me dilate more. It did not work, only hurt me cuz the doc couldnt get it right. So they decided to do pitocin. I was on pitocin for a day and a half. They finally decided to break my water and that's when I started getting contractions that hurt really bad so I got the epidural. About 4 hours later they check me and say that I was 9 cm and I can start pushing.. well I did for about 30 mins and the doc said that my son had the cord wrapped around him, so they rushed me into the OR for an emergency c section. I was in labor for 60 Hours... it was the worse exexperience ever.. I went through 12 bags of IV water and by the time I had him my whole body retained all of the water. It was horrible. I was bigger leaving the hospital than coming in. I was in the hospital for 6 days... 3 of them were labor and the other 3 were postpartum. I went through a lot. I think it would have been a lot better if I had better nurses.  I am pregnant with my second boy and my doc said that I will not be getting induced because I had a c section. I am sure yours will not be like mineSo please don't worry too much. I don't know anyone that has ever went through what I did lol. Everyone I know their labor and delivery was easy.
Also I wasn't even in the hospital for 48 hours after I had her (:
Oh lord :( That's my fear being in labor for hours. Ugh :/ now I'm praying my blood pressure is normal tomorrow so I don't get induced lol

question: Mommies who had their labor induced and weren't dilated at all, how did it go ?   And what was the reason why you had to get induced ? I might get induced because my blood pressure was pretty high today 140/100. I have to go back Wednesday and my Dr said even if it's a little high he wants to induce me. I'll be 37 weeks Wednesday and I'm not dilated at all. I wanted to have an unmedicated labor but if I get induced I think I won't be able to handle it. I'm really scared ;( i wanted my baby to come when he was ready.
title: Induced Labor Stories
